Questions.Question: In Grey's Anatomy, what is Dr. Meredith Grey's specialty?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Meredith Grey is a general surgeon at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital in the TV series Grey's Anatomy.

Questions.Question: Which medical drama is set in a teaching hospital in Boston?
Questions.Explanation: St. Elsewhere is set in the fictional St. Eligius Hospital, a teaching hospital in Boston.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the hospital in the series Scrubs?
Questions.Explanation: Sacred Heart Hospital is the main setting for the comedy-drama series Scrubs, where the characters work and interact.

Questions.Question: Which show features Dr. Gregory House as the main character?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Gregory House, an unconventional diagnostician, is the central character in the medical drama series House.

Questions.Question: Which medical drama is inspired by the early career of Dr. Phil McGraw?
Questions.Explanation: The Bull is loosely based on the early career of Dr. Phil McGraw, the founder of one of the most prolific trial-consulting firms.

Questions.Question: What medical profession does Dr. John Carter pursue in ER?
Questions.Explanation: In the series ER, Dr. John Carter initially pursues a career in surgery but eventually shifts to a career in emergency medicine.

Questions.Question: Who plays the lead role of Dr. Temperance Brennan in Bones?
Questions.Explanation: Emily Deschanel portrays the role of Dr. Temperance Brennan, a forensic anthropologist, in the TV series Bones.

Questions.Question: Which medical series is known for its distinctive use of narrations by the lead character?
Questions.Explanation: House is known for its distinctive use of narrations by Dr. Gregory House, reflecting his thoughts and observations.

Questions.Question: Which show features a group of surgical interns at Seattle Grace Hospital?
Questions.Explanation: Grey's Anatomy follows the personal and professional lives of surgical interns and their supervisors at Seattle Grace Hospital.

Questions.Question: In which medical drama does Dr. Hank Lawson work as a concierge doctor in the Hamptons?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Hank Lawson is a concierge doctor catering to wealthy clients in the Hamptons in the medical comedy-drama series Royal Pains.

Questions.Question: Which show centers on the daily struggles of the staff at All Saints' Hospital in Chicago?
Questions.Explanation: Chicago Hope focuses on the personal and professional struggles of the staff at the fictional All Saints' Hospital in Chicago.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the hospital in the series The Night Shift?
Questions.Explanation: The Night Shift is set in the San Antonio Memorial Hospital, where a group of doctors work the night shift in the emergency room.

Questions.Question: Which series revolves around the lives of paramedics and firefighters in Chicago?
Questions.Explanation: Chicago Fire follows the firefighters and paramedics of Firehouse 51, navigating the challenges and dangers of their profession in Chicago.

Questions.Question: What show focuses on the challenges faced by surgeons at a fictional teaching hospital in Seattle?
Questions.Explanation: Grey's Anatomy centers on the personal and professional challenges faced by the surgical team at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital.

Questions.Question: In which medical drama does Dr. Martin Ellingham work as a general practitioner in a small village?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Martin Ellingham is a surgeon-turned-general-practitioner dealing with the eccentric residents of Portwenn village in the series Doc Martin.

Questions.Question: Which medical drama is set in the emergency department of Gaffney Chicago Medical Center?
Questions.Explanation: Chicago Med is set in the emergency department of Gaffney Chicago Medical Center, depicting the challenges faced by medical professionals.

Questions.Question: What specialty does Dr. Allison Cameron pursue in House?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Allison Cameron is an immunologist who initially joins Dr. Gregory House's diagnostic team in the medical drama series House.

Questions.Question: Which series follows the professional and personal lives of NYPD paramedics?
Questions.Explanation: Third Watch delves into the intertwined professional and personal lives of paramedics, police officers, and firefighters of the fictional 55th Precinct in New York City.

Questions.Question: In which series does Dr. Michaela Quinn work as a doctor in a 19th-century Colorado town?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman depicts the life and medical practice of Dr. Michaela Quinn in the 19th-century town of Colorado Springs.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the hospital where Dr. John Thackery works in The Knick?
Questions.Explanation: Dr. John Thackery is the chief surgeon at the Knickerbocker Hospital in the early 1900s, depicted in the series The Knick.
